attributes.action: confirm that council tax rates on homes will not be increased as result of improvements or location identified by home inspection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there is compelling evidence that the government is intending to increase council tax take as a result of their regime of home inspections, penalising home owners who have improved their homes and lives out of already taxed income. This is a disgrace and must not be allowed to take place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
